Review Text: The food at the Mexican was great, be careful if you're not at all into spicy food as mexican dishes often are. You could probably ask without jalapenos. The staff (1 serving, 1 cooking) were kind and great at their respective jobs. Service was quick and and the atmosphere felt like you were being served authentic mexican food.

Name: The Mexican
Review Text: Located a few paces off Dam Square.  Friendly folks that appreciate your business. Place is spotlessly clean. Great place to sit outdoors and watch the crowd go by. Excellent ribs  and steak . Nothing fancy but I highly recommend it.
